overview: Lazy dreamer Sanjay finally hits the jackpot when he buys a winning lottery ticket -- or so he thinks. When it turns out that the newspaper listed the wrong winning number, Sanjay goes insane and leaves his family. Seven years later, the now-stable Sanjay returns home to his wife and daughter and finds a much different home than the one he left. The Gujurati drama stars Deepak Dave, Pratap Sachdev, Pratim Parekh and Manisha Vora.
title: Himkavach
